mapper.select: SELECT user_id, password, name, role, start_date FROM users;
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET user_id = #{userId}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, role = #{role}, start_date = #{startDate} WHERE user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (name, user_id, password, role, start_date) VALUES (#{name}, #{userId}, #{password}, #{role}, #{startDate});
